details.returns:
Returns

If you’ve changed your mind about keeping your purchase, please return it in its original condition with proof of purchase and we’ll exchange or refund it. Unless faulty, this should be within 35 days of receiving your order. By original condition, we’d expect this to mean that you’ve kept packaging and labels, and that the item is undamaged and unused.

You can return for free in the UK via John Lewis and Waitrose Shops, Royal Mail, Collect+ or MyHermes. If you need to arrange collection of large or heavy items, call us on 03456 049 049. For international returns queries, call us on +44 1698 545 454

You’ll find returns information on your delivery note. Exceptions apply to certain products - find out more about our refund policy
details.returnsHeadline:
Returns -

See more details
details.productInformation:
The HFC 2B19 Freestanding Dishwasher from Hotpoint will mean less time doing the washing up and more time doing the things you love.

It has an adjustable top tray, and you can create extra space in the basket below for larger pans or jugs. Overall there is room for up to 13 place settings so it’s easy to wash-up even after big gatherings.

The LED interface lets you easily select one of the 5 great programs which include Rapid, Eco, Soak and Half-Load cycles.

It has a stainless steel tub for better hygiene, a very silent motor and comes with an A+ energy rating. It also has a Delay Timer function so you can start the cycle whenever is most convenient for you.

attributes.name: Wash performance
attributes.toolTip: Graded on performance A - G, with A being the highest grade. The higher the grade the more energy efficient the appliance.

attributes.name: Noise Level
attributes.toolTip: How noisy, in decibels, the machine is. The lower the dB, the quieter the appliance

attributes.name: Time remaining indicator
attributes.toolTip: Tells you how long the programme's got to go

attributes.name: Energy Consumption Per Standard Cycle
attributes.toolTip: Based on the drying cycle of the standard cotton programme at full load. Actual energy consumption per cycle will depend on how the appliance is used.

attributes.name: Adjustable racking
attributes.toolTip: Lets you move the racking around to fit large or awkward items

attributes.name: Delicate Wash
attributes.toolTip: This wash cycle provides a gentle wash for delicate items

attributes.name: Program Sequence Indicator
attributes.toolTip: Tells you the progress of your washing/drying cycle

attributes.name: Estimated Annual Energy Consumption
attributes.toolTip: How much electricity the item would use over a year

attributes.name: Place Settings
attributes.toolTip: A complete set of items provided for one person at a meal

attributes.name: Energy Rating
attributes.toolTip: Graded on performance, from A+++ to G, with A+++ being the highest rating. Higher ratings mean better energy efficiency

attributes.name: Overflow protection
attributes.toolTip: An anti-flood device prevents the machine from being damaged by flooding from the inlet pipe

attributes.name: Automatic Load Adjustment
attributes.toolTip: Automatically adjusts water level for a smaller load, thus saving time and money

attributes.name: Drying performance
attributes.toolTip: Graded on performance A - G, with A being the highest grade

attributes.name: Quick wash
attributes.toolTip: Speedy programme when you need items cleaned quickly

attributes.name: Estimated Annual Water Consumption
attributes.toolTip: The amount of water used in litres per year, based on 220 standard washing cycles for cotton programs at 60°C and 40°C at full and partial load. Actual water consumption will depend on how the appliance is used.

attributes.name: Care instructions
attributes.value: Wipe clean with a damp cloth

details.editorsNotes:
Your complete kitchen partner
Hotpoint loves home, in all its various types and sizes. It's a place for relaxation, to entertain, to nurture and bring up the family. A place to live your life and an expression of who you are. Quite simply, their mission for over 100 years has been to make your life at home easier. So whatever, you need Hotpoint has developed a product for you. A range of products, that always deliver outstanding performance, with the latest intelligent technology and functional stylish design.

It all started in 1911, when the ‘Hotpoint Electric Heating Company' was officially founded – the first major product was an iron that got hot at the point to help get shirt collars stiff. From that point, they have never looked back. The following years saw the first Hotpoint Washing Machines, Vacuums, Refrigerators and much much more!

Now, a Hotpoint appliance is sold every 19 seconds in the UK and you will find a Hotpoint appliance in 2 out of 3 homes.
